item.description:
Panera Bread @ Buckland Mall

Morning Networking & Organizational Meeting - Topic of discussion will be the previous open house and the next 2/18/10 event - "Effective Connecting: How to best keep in contact with your network." This presentation will be given by our own Ralph Westerberg!

Come prepared to:


  • Talk about the January Open House - Let's see what we did right and what we can do better.
  • Bring contacts to Bill so he can run an effective PR campaign.
  • Nail down the "Sizzle" needed for the next presentation.



See you all on the 2nd!

All my best,
Dan Dionne

group.name: Rainmakers Business Strategy / Networking Meetup Group 06066

item.name: Rainmakers February Freeze-up #1
